statements.select: select a.order_id ,a.order_no ,a.order_date ,a.order_type_id ,a.order_reason_id ,a.ref_order_id ,a.ref_order_no ,a.request_date ,a.complete_date ,a.unit_id ,a.pos_id ,a.warehouse_id ,a.remark ,a.data_from_id ,a.status ,a.status_desc ,a.create_time ,a.create_user_id ,a.modify_time ,a.modify_user_id ,a.send_time ,a.send_user_id ,a.approve_time ,a.approve_user_id ,a.accpect_time ,a.accpect_user_id ,(select prop_name from T_Prop where prop_id = a.data_from_id) data_from_name ,(select wh_name From t_warehouse where warehouse_id = a.warehouse_id) warehouse_name ,(select unit_name From t_unit where unit_id = a.unit_id) unit_name ,(select convert(decimal(18,4),sum(order_qty)) From t_cc_detail x where x.order_id = a.order_id group by x.order_id) total_qty From T_CC a
statements.sql:
Declare @TmpTable Table (order_id nvarchar(100) ,row_no int );
insert into @TmpTable (order_id,row_no) select x.order_id ,x.rownum_ From ( select rownum_=row_number() over(order by a.order_no) ,order_id from t_cc a
where 1=1 and a.status != '-1'
a.order_id like '%' + #order_id# + '%'
a.customer_id like '%' + #customer_id# + '%'
a.order_no like '%' + #order_no# + '%'
a.order_type_id like '%' + #order_type_id# + '%'
a.order_reason_id like '%' + #order_reason_id# + '%'
a.unit_id like '%' + #unit_id# + '%'
a.order_date >= #order_date_begin#
a.order_date <= #order_date_end#
a.complete_date >= #complete_date_begin#
a.complete_date <= #complete_date_end#
a.status= #status#
a.unit_id= #unit_id#
a.warehouse_id= #warehouse_id#
a.data_from_id= #data_from_id#
) x ;
Declare @iCount int;
select @iCount = COUNT(*) From @TmpTable;
statements.select: select a.order_id ,a.order_no ,a.order_date ,a.order_type_id ,a.order_reason_id ,a.ref_order_id ,a.ref_order_no ,a.request_date ,a.complete_date ,a.unit_id ,a.pos_id ,a.warehouse_id ,a.remark ,a.data_from_id ,a.status ,a.status_desc ,a.create_time ,a.create_user_id ,a.modify_time ,a.modify_user_id ,a.send_time ,a.send_user_id ,a.approve_time ,a.approve_user_id ,a.accpect_time ,a.accpect_user_id ,(select prop_name from T_Prop where prop_id = a.data_from_id) data_from_name ,(select wh_name From t_warehouse where warehouse_id = a.warehouse_id) warehouse_name ,(select unit_name From t_unit where unit_id = a.unit_id) unit_name ,b.row_no ,@iCount icount ,(select convert(decimal(18,4),sum(order_qty)) From t_cc_detail x where x.order_id = a.order_id group by x.order_id) total_qty From T_CC a inner join @TmpTable b on(a.order_id = b.order_id) where 1=1 and b.row_no > #StartRow# and b.row_no <= #EndRow# ;
statements.update:
update T_CC set [status] = #status# ,status_desc = #status_desc# ,Modify_Time = #modify_time# ,Modify_User_Id = #modify_user_id#
approve_user_id=#approve_user_id# approve_time=#approve_time#
where order_id = #order_id#
statements.select:
select count(*) From T_CC where 1=1
order_id != #OrderId#
and order_no = #OrderNo#

select COUNT(*) icount From t_unit a inner join T_Unit_Property b on(a.unit_id = b.unit_id) inner join T_CC c on(a.unit_id = c.unit_id) inner join t_bill d on(c.order_id = d.bill_id) inner join T_Def_Bill_Status e on(d.bill_Status = e.bill_status and d.bill_kind_id=e.bill_kind_id) where b.property_id = '7FEC7E91057A477DA030CD5449D0A372' and b.property_value = '8F330D04320F4F05AC78912577BCE0FD' and e.end_flag='1' and c.order_id = #OrderId#;
select COUNT(*) icount From t_inout where ref_order_id = #OrderId#
select COUNT(*) From T_CC_Detail where end_qty <> order_qty and order_id = #OrderId#
select count(*) from t_cc where 1=1 and order_id = #OrderId#
select count(*) from t_cc_detail where 1=1 and order_detail_id = #OrderDetailId#
select count(*) from t_cc where 1=1 and order_id = #order_id# and status = '10'
